class.name: BoxPlotVisualiser
class.documentation: The following parameters allow the user to define both the data and the plotting attributes of boxplots.

parameter.name: boxplot_box
parameter.documentation: Turns the plotting of the box on or off

parameter.name: boxplot_box_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the box

parameter.name: boxplot_box_width
parameter.documentation: Width of the box in centimeters

parameter.name: boxplot_box_border
parameter.documentation: Determines whether the box border is drawn or not

parameter.name: boxplot_box_border_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the box border

parameter.name: boxplot_box_border_thickness
parameter.documentation: Thickness of the box border

parameter.name: boxplot_box_border_line_style
parameter.documentation: Line style of the box border

parameter.name: boxplot_median
parameter.documentation: Determines whether the median line is drawn or not

parameter.name: boxplot_median_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the median line

parameter.name: boxplot_median_thickness
parameter.documentation: Thickness of the median line

parameter.name: boxplot_median_line_style
parameter.documentation: Line style of the median line

parameter.name: boxplot_whisker
parameter.documentation: Determines whether the whiskers are shown as lines, boxes or not at all

parameter.name: boxplot_whisker_box_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the whisker box

parameter.name: boxplot_whisker_box_width
parameter.documentation: Width of the whisker box in centimeters

parameter.name: boxplot_whisker_box_border
parameter.documentation: Determines whether the whisker box border is drawn or not

parameter.name: boxplot_whisker_box_border_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the whisker box border

parameter.name: boxplot_whisker_box_border_thickness
parameter.documentation: Thickness of the whisker box border

parameter.name: boxplot_whisker_box_border_line_style
parameter.documentation: Line style of the whisker box border

parameter.name: boxplot_whisker_line_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the whisker line

parameter.name: boxplot_whisker_line_thickness
parameter.documentation: Thickness of the whisker line

parameter.name: boxplot_whisker_line_style
parameter.documentation: Line style of the whisker line
